With bhajans playing in the background and devotees in line, watching the aarati is a once-in-a-lifetime experience.

The famous Pashupatinath Aarati is performed in the evenings on the bank of the #Bagmati River in honor of the sacred river, Gods, and temple. Aarati is a Hindu ceremony in which wicks soaked in oil/ghee are lit and waved in circular motions to express humility and gratitude.

#Nepal is a #spiritual country where beliefs and rituals are revered & religiously observed. Attend the #Pashupatinath Aarti during your visit to #Nepal to feel the power of the divine.
